sentence: The mujer who was walking in the plaza suddenly stopped to mirar cuando escuchó un grito.
The mujer who was cooking in the kitchen suddenly dropped la cuchara when she heard un ruido fuerte.
The pájaro that was singing in the tree flew away cuando escuchó un trueno fuerte.
The hombre who was walking down the street suddenly decided to correr cuando vio un perro grande coming towards him.
El perro that was barking loudly suddenly decided to dormir en el jardín.
The hombre who was sitting on the bench suddenly stood up para ayudar cuando vio a una mujer caer.
The niño who was playing outside quickly ran para esconderse cuando vio la lluvia.
The gato that was sleeping on the roof decided to correr cuando escuchó un ruido extraño.
The coche that was parked on the street suddenly started a moverse cuando el semáforo cambió de color.
The niña who was reading a book en el parque suddenly decided to correr cuando vio un gato.
